transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, yes.
Executive: Hello, yes ma'am, this side Himanshu from IndiaMART. Good afternoon.
Executive: Ma'am actually I got a call from the number 0862871806.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Actually yes ma'am actually aap aapne hi kiya tha kya ma'am call is number se?
Customer: Haan, maine hi kiya hai.
Customer: Actually maine na mere number se maine IndiaMART pe inquiry dala tha screen duty motor ka, theek hai?
Executive: Achha achha, haan ma'am boliye boliye.
Customer: To abhi wo fulfill ho gayi hai to wo waha se aap nikal do na. Kyuki baar baar phone aa rahe hai.
Executive: Achha aapne requirement post kiya tha?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ek second sir, main aapka login hi kar raha hu. Ek minute page login kar lo aapka.
Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan boliye na sir.
Executive: Haan yes ma'am. Ma'am ye actually aap hi apne end se remove kar paoge. Jaise ki main bata deta hu, guide kar deta hu aapko main.
Executive: Haan ma'am buyer tools mein ek baar aap jaaiye.
Customer: Wo kaha se jaana hai? Login karna padega na pehle?
Executive: Haan pehle haan login kar lijiye ma'am.
Customer: Ek minute matlab mera number matlab alag hai actually. Lekin wo IndiaMART mein register hai ya to malum kaise padega sir?
Executive: Haan ji ma'am.
Customer: Login karna padega na? OTP aa jayega na?
Executive: Haan ma'am OTP jayega. OTP registered mobile number pe 9991 ke phone pe jayega shayad.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Naines sir ke paas jayega OTP ma'am.
Customer: Achha achha system mein to login hi ho. Haan system mein login nahi hai ma'am.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute login hai ek minute.

Customer: Chalo rakhiye.
Customer: Isme show ho raha hai kya?

Customer: Hello?
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Yes ma'am.
Customer: Hello, haan boliye.
Executive: Haan haan ma'am. Login karne ke baad na ek baar dekhiyega ma'am. Dekhiye right left hand side mein aapko settings ka ek option dikh raha hoga sabse niche settings aur upar dikh raha hoga buyer tools.
Customer: Haan buyer tools.
Executive: Dikh raha hai? Abhi dekhiyega ma'am isme aapko post by requirement aapko dikh raha hoga sabse pehla tab.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan abhi dekhiyega my orders pe ek baar click kariyega.
Customer: Haan view all.
Executive: Haan my orders mein kuch dikh raha hai aapko wo requirement dikh rahi hai jo aapne post kiya tha?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Waha dekhiye ma'am waha deactivate ya delete karne ka option hoga ma'am ek.
Customer: Kaha pe hoga?
Executive: Usi mein hoga ma'am actually main main wo privilege nahi hu ki main us page ko dekh saku. Aap agar link join kar sako to ma'am main help kar dunga. Aapko agar link share karu to aap mere ko apni screen share kar dena.
Customer: Ji ji ji bilkul.
Executive: Hai na? To haan hum log main aapko guide kar dunga fir aap apne end se hata dena kyuki mere ko wo show nahi karega wo page. Hai na? Main aapko link share kar raha hu ma'am aap ek baar join karo. Hai na? Isi number pe share kar du?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isi number pe join karoge to wapas issue hoga. Mail ID. Mail ID pe share kar deta hu ma'am mail ID pe aa jayega aapko.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ma'am mail ID pe share kar du aapko? Mail ID.
Customer: Haan yahi hai mera na. Kar do na mere ispe.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.

Executive: Hold kariyega main share hi kar raha hu.
Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Ma'am dekhiyega mail pe bhi share hua hai. Baaki number pe main abhi aapko share kar raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai. Main phone rakh raha hu. Hai na? Aapko abhi abhi isi number pe share kar de raha hu.
Customer: Ji theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove requirement posted on IndiaMART.

- Receiving repeated calls regarding the requirement.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to remove requirement.

- Executive offered to share a link for assistance.

- Executive shared the link on customer's mail ID.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share the link on customer's number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, remove, requirement, link
